ErrorCode.name: ADAPTER.IT RESOURCE DEFINTION NOT FOUND
ErrorCode.ERR_DESC: The requested IT Resource Defintion Type does not exist in the system.

ErrorCode.name: ADAPTER.IT RESOURCE INSTANCE NOT FOUND
ErrorCode.ERR_DESC: The requested IT Resource Instance does not exist in the system.

Adapter.name: OCS PrePopulate String
Adapter.ADP_DESCRIPTION: Pre Populate a string value from a global profile.

AdapterVariable.name: Adapter return value
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: Return variable

AdapterVariable.name: profileValue
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The value to be pre-populated

Adapter.name: OCS PrePopulate Substring
Adapter.ADP_DESCRIPTION: Pre Populate the process form value from a global profile by substring conversion.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The string to build the substring from.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::2:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The start index of the profile value.The character at this index will be part of the returned substring.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::3:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The end index of the profile value. The character at this index will not be part of the returned substring.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:constructor
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The Business Logic Layer Facade provided by Identity Manager.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Output:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The new string that is a substring of the profile value starting at startIndex until endIndex.

AdapterVariable.name: Adapter return value
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: Return variable

AdapterVariable.name: profileValue
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The value to be pre-populated.

AdapterVariable.name: startIndex
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The start index of the profile value.The character at this index will be part of the returned substring.

AdapterVariable.name: endIndex
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The end index of the profile value. The character at this index will not be part of the returned substring.

Adapter.name: OCS PrePopulate String Converted
Adapter.ADP_DESCRIPTION: Pre Populate a string value from a global profile that will returnd converted.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::2:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The convertion rule to apply.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Output:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The new string that is converted by applying the specified rule to the given input.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:constructor
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The Business Logic Layer Facade provided by Identity Manager.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The string to convert.

AdapterVariable.name: Adapter return value
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: Return variable

AdapterVariable.name: profileValue
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The value provided by the profile that has to be converted.

AdapterVariable.name: convertRule
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The rule how to convert the provided profile value.

Adapter.name: OCS PrePopulate Integer
Adapter.ADP_DESCRIPTION: Pre Populate a int value from a global profile by receiving a string and converting it to a primitive int.

AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The value to convert to a numerical value.

AdapterVariable.name: Adapter return value
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: Return variable

AdapterVariable.name: profileValue
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The source value to be pre-populated in a process form.

Adapter.name: OCS PrePopulate Long
Adapter.ADP_DESCRIPTION: Pre Populate a long value from a global profile by receiving a string and converting it to a primitive long.

AdapterVariable.name: Adapter return value

AdapterVariable.name: profileValue
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The source value to be pre-populated in a process form.

Adapter.name: OCS PrePopulate Date
Adapter.ADP_DESCRIPTION: Pre Populate a date value by evaluating a specified amount of days to the passed date value

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Output:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The evaluated date

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:constructor
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The Business Logic Layer Facade provided by Identity Manager

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The date value passed in from a profile

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::2:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The number of days, which are to be added to the passed date

AdapterVariable.name: Adapter return value

AdapterVariable.name: profileValue
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The Value to be pre-populated

AdapterVariable.name: daysAhead
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The number of days, which are to be added to the passed date when the event occurs

Adapter.name: OCS PrePopulate Today
Adapter.ADP_DESCRIPTION: Pre Populate a date value by evaluating a specified amount of days to the current date

Adapter.name: OCS PrePopulate Display Name
Adapter.ADP_DESCRIPTION: Pre Populate a name from a global profile by concatenating three string parts

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::2:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The second part of the string to concate

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:constructor
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The Business Logic Layer Facade provided by Identity Manager

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The first part of the string to concate

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::3:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The character used to separate the first and second part of the new string to build

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Output:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The concatenated strings profileValue1 and profileValue2 separated by the specified character

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::2:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The third part of the string to concate.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::3:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The character used to separate the first and second part of the new string to build

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The first part of the string to concate build by task Build First Part

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Output:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The concatenated strings build from task Build First Part and profileValue3 separated by the specified character

AdapterVariable.name: Adapter return value
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: Return variable

AdapterVariable.name: profileValue1
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The part of the name that will be concatenated at the front

AdapterVariable.name: profileValue2
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The part of the name that will be concatenated in the middle if it's not empty

AdapterVariable.name: profileValue3
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The part of the name that will be concatenated at the end

AdapterVariable.name: profileValueSeparator
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The character used to separate the particular parts of the name to build

Adapter.name: OCS PrePopulate Concat Name
Adapter.ADP_DESCRIPTION: Pre Populate a name from a global profile by concatenating two string parts seperated by a specific character.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::2:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The second part of the string to concate.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Output:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The concatenated strings profileValue1 and profileValue2 separated by the specified character.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:constructor
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The Business Logic Layer Facade provided by Identity Manager.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::3:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The character used to separate the first and second part of the new string to build.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The first part of the string to concate.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::4:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The rule how to convert the concatenated result.

AdapterVariable.name: Adapter return value
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: Return variable

AdapterVariable.name: profileValue1
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The part of the name that will be concatenated at the front.

AdapterVariable.name: profileValue2
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The part of the name that will be concatenated at the end.

AdapterVariable.name: profileValueSeparator
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The character used to separate the particular parts of the name to build.

AdapterVariable.name: convertRule
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The rule how to convert the concatenated result.

Adapter.name: OCS PrePopulate Concatenation
Adapter.ADP_DESCRIPTION: Pre Populate a string value by concatenating two strings.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:constructor
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The Business Logic Layer Facade provided by Identity Manager

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Output:method

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::2:Input:method

AdapterVariable.name: stringSuffix

Adapter.name: OCS PrePopulate Decoded Value
Adapter.ADP_DESCRIPTION: Pre Populate a string value served by the decoded value of a lookup defintion for an encoded value.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::2:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The value provided by a profile like Identity or Organization used as the encoded value to lookup the decoded value for from the lookup definition specified by adapter variable lookupDefinition.

AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The name of the Lookup Definition providing the data.

AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The Business Logic Layer Facade provided by Identity Manager.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Output:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The desired decoded value for the specified encoded value obtained from the Lookup Definition. If the encoed value cannot be resolved the encoded value itself is returned instead.

AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: Return variable

AdapterVariable.name: profileValue
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The value provided by a profile like Identity or Organization used as the encoded value to lookup the decoded value for from the lookup definition specified by adapter variable lookupDefinition.

AdapterVariable.name: lookupDefinition
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The name of the Lookup Definition providing the data.

Adapter.name: OCS Propagate Profile Bulk
Adapter.ADP_DESCRIPTION: Propagate the changes on a global profile value to any process form in bulk.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:constructor
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The Business Logic Layer Facade provided by Identity Manager.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The Process Instance key providing the data for this provisioning tasks.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::2:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The name of the Lookup Definition specifying the Attribute Mapping of user form fields that part of a provisioning task.

AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The collection of user form data which have to be transfered to the process data form.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Output:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: An appropriate response message

AdapterResponseCode.name: SUCCESS
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Changes are applied on the process form data.

AdapterResponseCode.name: FAILURE
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Not able to apply changes on the process form data

AdapterVariable.name: Adapter return value
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: Return variable

AdapterVariable.name: processInstance
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The Process Instance providing the data of an account model.

AdapterVariable.name: attributeMapping
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The name of the Lookup Definition specifying the Attribute Mapping of user form fields and their transformation that part of a provisioning task.

AdapterVariable.name: data
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The changed values of an identity entity like user, organization or role etc.

Adapter.name: OCS Set String Value Converted
Adapter.ADP_DESCRIPTION: Set a string value during processing of an event. The string is converted by applying the specified conversion rules before it will be returned.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The string to convert.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:constructor
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The Business Logic Layer Facade provided by Identity Manager.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::2:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The convertion rule to apply.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Output:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The new string that is converted by applying the specified rule to the given input.

AdapterVariable.name: Adapter return value
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: Return variable

AdapterVariable.name: profileValue
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The value to be converted by this adapter instance before it will be set.

AdapterVariable.name: convertRule
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The rule how to convert the provided profile value.

Adapter.name: OCS Generate Password
Adapter.ADP_DESCRIPTION: Password handler to generate password during processing of a reconciliation insert event

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Output:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The generated password with the desired length.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::2:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The desired length of the generated password.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The mapping key for the desired alphabet.

AdapterVariable.name: Adapter return value
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: Return variable

AdapterVariable.name: alphabet
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The mapping key of the alphabet to use for generating the password

AdapterVariable.name: length
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The desired length of the ganarated password

Adapter.name: OCS Move Organization
Adapter.ADP_DESCRIPTION: OCS Move Organization

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The key of the organization the actual organization should be moved to

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Output:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The name of the organization the parameter organizationKey belongs to

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:constructor
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The Business Logic Layer Facade provided by Identity Manager

AdapterVariable.name: Adapter return value
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: Return variable

AdapterVariable.name: organizationKey
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The key of the organization the actual organization should be moved to

Adapter.name: OCS Move User
Adapter.ADP_DESCRIPTION: Move a user

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The key of the organization the user should be moved to.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:constructor
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The Business Logic Layer Facade provided by Identity Manager.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Output:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The name of the organization the parameter organizationKey belongs to.

AdapterVariable.name: Adapter return value
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: Return variable

AdapterVariable.name: organizationKey
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The key of the organization the user should be moved to

Adapter.name: OCS Assign Group Membership
Adapter.ADP_DESCRIPTION: Assigns an Identity Manager user as a member to a specific Identity Manager user group

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::2:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The internal identifier of the user that has to be checked

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Output:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: Whether the user is member of the group

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The internal identifier of the group that has to be checked

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Output:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The desired internal identifier for the specified group name. If the group name is not in the system -1 will be returned.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:constructor
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The Business Logic Layer Facade provided by Identity Manager.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The public identifier of the group to resolve.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The internal identifier of the group where the user should be assigned to

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Output:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: An appropriate Response Code

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::2:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The internal identifier of the user that has to be assigned to the group

AdapterResponseCode.name: FAILURE
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Could not grant membership

AdapterResponseCode.name: ALREADY
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Membership already granted

AdapterResponseCode.name: SUCCESS
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Membership has been granted

AdapterResponseCode.name: NOTFOUND
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Group to assign does not exists in the system

AdapterVariable.name: Adapter return value
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: Return variable

AdapterVariable.name: groupName
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The name of the group where the user should be assigned to

AdapterVariable.name: userKey
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The internal identifier of the user that has to be assigned to a group

Adapter.name: OCS Revoke Group Membership
Adapter.ADP_DESCRIPTION: Removes an Identity Manager user as a member from a specific Identity Manager user group

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The internal identifier of the group where the user should be removed from

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::2:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The internal identifier of the user that has to be removed from the group

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Output:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: Whether the user is member of the group

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:constructor
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The Business Logic Layer Facade provided by Identity Manager

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Output:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The internal identifier of the group where the user should be removed from

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The public identifier of the group where the user should be removed from

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::2:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The internal identifier of the user that has to be removed from the group

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The internal identifier of the group where the user should be removed from

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Output:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: An appropriate Response Code

AdapterResponseCode.name: FAILURE
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Could not revoke membership

AdapterResponseCode.name: NOTFOUND
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Group to revoke does not exists in the system

AdapterResponseCode.name: ALREADY
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Membership already revoked

AdapterResponseCode.name: SUCCESS
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Membership has been revoked

AdapterVariable.name: Adapter return value
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: Return variable

AdapterVariable.name: userKey
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The internal identifier of the user that has to be removed from the group

AdapterVariable.name: groupName
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The internal identifier of the group where the user should be removed from

Adapter.name: OCS Notify User Group
Adapter.ADP_DESCRIPTION: Send a notification to an existing user group and a generic email address in cc from any process task with the specified email definition

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::4:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The Task Instance key providing the data for the adapter.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Output:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: An appropriate response message

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The name of the user group that should receive the notification

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:constructor
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The Business Logic Layer Facade provided by Identity Manager

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::2:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The generic email address that should receive the notification in cc

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::3:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The name of the email definition used to build the email subject and body

AdapterResponseCode.name: MMS-00008
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Not able to connect to e-Mail Server: Invalid or incorrect User Login or User Password entered in IT Resource

AdapterResponseCode.name: MMS-00003
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Email Server Definition not configured

AdapterResponseCode.name: MMS-00007
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Could not connect to SMTP host specified in IT Resource; port: 25

AdapterResponseCode.name: MMS-00005
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: An e-Mail Address for the sender must be specified to send

AdapterResponseCode.name: MMS-00006
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: An e-Mail Address for the recipient must be specified to send

AdapterResponseCode.name: MMS-00004
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Email Template Definition is not available

AdapterResponseCode.name: SUCCESS
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Nofification send successfully

AdapterResponseCode.name: MMS-00009
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Notification not delivered to all recipients

AdapterResponseCode.name: MMS-00002
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: An unhandled exception has occured

AdapterResponseCode.name: MMS-00001
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: An general exception has occured

AdapterVariable.name: Adapter return value
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: Return variable

AdapterVariable.name: taskInstance
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The task instance that sends the notification

AdapterVariable.name: ccAddress
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The email address that should receive the notification in cc

AdapterVariable.name: userGroup
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The name of the user group that should receive the notification

AdapterVariable.name: templateName
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The Email Definition that provides the template with placeholder values

Adapter.name: OCS Notify User Login
Adapter.ADP_DESCRIPTION: Send a notification to an existing user login from and a generic email address that recieves thnotification as carbon copy any process task with the specified email definition

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::2:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The generic email address that should receive the notification in cc

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:constructor
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The Business Logic Layer Facade provided by Identity Manager

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::3:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The name of the email definition used to build the email subject and body.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::4:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The Task Instance key providing the data for the adapter.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The login name of the user that should receive the notification

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Output:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: An appropriate response message

AdapterResponseCode.name: MMS-00007
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Could not connect to SMTP host specified in IT Resource; port: 25

AdapterResponseCode.name: MMS-00003
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Email Server Definition not configured

AdapterResponseCode.name: MMS-00005
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: An e-Mail Address for the sender must be specified to send

AdapterResponseCode.name: MMS-00006
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: An e-Mail Address for the recipient must be specified to send

AdapterResponseCode.name: MMS-00001
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: An general exception has occured

AdapterResponseCode.name: MMS-00002
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: An unhandled exception has occured

AdapterResponseCode.name: MMS-00004
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Email Template Definition is not available

AdapterResponseCode.name: MMS-00009
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Notification not delivered to all recipients

AdapterResponseCode.name: SUCCESS
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Nofification send successfully

AdapterResponseCode.name: MMS-00008
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: Not able to connect to e-Mail Server: Invalid or incorrect User Login or User Password entered in IT Resource

AdapterVariable.name: Adapter return value
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: Return variable

AdapterVariable.name: taskInstance
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The task instance that sends the notification

AdapterVariable.name: ccAddress
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The email address that should receive the notification in cc

AdapterVariable.name: userLogin
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The login name of the user that should receive the notification

AdapterVariable.name: templateName
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The Email Definition that provides the template with placeholder values

Adapter.name: OCS Notify Mail Address
Adapter.ADP_DESCRIPTION: Send a notification to a generic email address and a generic email address in cc from any process task with the specified email definition

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Output:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: An appropriate response message

AdapterResponseCode.name: MMS-00001
AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: An general exception has occured

AdapterResponseCode.ARS_DESC: An e-Mail Address for the recipient must be specified to send

AdapterResponseCode.name: MMS-00003

AdapterVariable.name: ccAddress

AdapterVariable.name: templateName
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The Email Definition that provides the template with placeholder values

Adapter.name: OCS Propagate Profile Concat Name
Adapter.ADP_DESCRIPTION: Propagate the changes on a global profile value to any process form by concatenating two string parts seperated by a specific character based on the profile value.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:constructor
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The Business Logic Layer Facade provided by Identity Manager.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Output:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The concatenated strings profileValue1 and profileValue2 separated by the specified character.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::1:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The first part of the string to concate.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::2:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The second part of the string to concate.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::3:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The character used to separate the first and second part of the new string to build.

AdapterTaskParam.name: ::~~::4:Input:method
AdapterTaskParam.ATP_DESCRIPTION: The rule how to convert the concatenated result.

AdapterVariable.name: Adapter return value
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: Return variable

AdapterVariable.name: profileValue1
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The part of the name that will be concatenated at the front.

AdapterVariable.name: profileValue2
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The part of the name that will be concatenated at the end.

AdapterVariable.name: profileValueSeparator
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The character used to separate the particular parts of the name to build.

AdapterVariable.name: convertRule
AdapterVariable.ADV_DESC: The rule how to convert the concatenated result.
